abstract: General Electric said its fourth-quarter profit rose 4 percent as surging overseas sales more than offset the fallout from domestic woes.
snippet: General Electric said its fourth-quarter profit rose 4 percent as surging overseas sales more than offset the fallout from domestic woes.
lead_paragraph: The General Electric Company said Friday that its fourth-quarter profit rose 4 percent as surging overseas sales more than offset the fallout from domestic woes. The company also reaffirmed its forecast that earnings per share would rise at least 10 percent this year.

headline.main: G.E. Profit Rises, Aided by Overseas Sales
